00007 // SnowmanOverlapAlgorithm - This class implements all the logic
00008 // for finding and outputting overlaps for sequence reads
00009 //
00010 #ifndef SNOWMAN_OVERLAPALGORITHM_H
00011 #define SNOWMAN_OVERLAPALGORITHM_H

00032 
00033 class SnowmanOverlapAlgorithm
00034 {
00035     public:
00036 
00037         SnowmanOverlapAlgorithm(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00038                          double er, int seedLen, int seedStride,
00039                          bool irrOnly, int maxSeeds = -1) : m_pBWT(pBWT), 
00040                                          m_pRevBWT(pRevBWT),
00041                                          m_errorRate(er),
00042                                          m_seedLength(seedLen),
00043                                          m_seedStride(seedStride),
00044                                          m_bIrreducible(irrOnly),
00045                                          m_exactModeOverlap(false),
00046                                          m_exactModeIrreducible(false),
00047                                          m_maxSeeds(maxSeeds) {}
00048 
00049         // Perform the overlap
00050         // This function is threaded so everything must be const
00051         OverlapResult overlapRead(const SeqRecord& read, int minOverlap, OverlapBlockList* pOutList) const;
00052     
00053         // Perform an irreducible overlap
00054         OverlapResult overlapReadExact(const SeqRecord& read, int minOverlap, OverlapBlockList* pOBOut) const;
00055 
00056         // Find duplicate blocks for this read
00057         OverlapResult alignReadDuplicate(const SeqRecord& read, OverlapBlockList* pOBOut) const;
00058 
00059         // Perform an inexact overlap
00060         OverlapResult overlapReadInexact(const SeqRecord& read, int minOverlap, OverlapBlockList* pOBOut) const;
00061 
00062         // Write the result of an overlap to an ASQG file
00063         void writeResultASQG(std::ostream& writer, const SeqRecord& read, const OverlapResult& result) const;
00064 
00065         // Write all the overlap blocks pList to the filehandle
00066         void writeOverlapBlocks(std::ostream& writer, size_t readIdx, bool isSubstring, const OverlapBlockList* pList) const;
00067         void writeOverlapBlocks(std::stringstream& writer, size_t readIdx, bool isSubstring, const OverlapBlockList* pList) const; //JEREMIAH
00068 
00069         // Build the forward history structures for the blocks
00070         void buildForwardHistory(OverlapBlockList* pList) const;
00071 
00072         // Set flag to use exact-match algorithms only
00073         void setExactModeOverlap(bool b) { m_exactModeOverlap = b; }
00074         void setExactModeIrreducible(bool b) { m_exactModeIrreducible = b; }
00075 
00076         //
00077         const BWT* getBWT() const { return m_pBWT; }
00078         const BWT* getRBWT() const { return m_pRevBWT; }
00079         
00080     private:
00081 
00082         // Calculate the ranges in pBWT that contain a prefix of at least minOverlap basepairs that
00083         // overlaps with a suffix of w.
00084         void findOverlapBlocksExact(const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00085                                     const AlignFlags& af, const int minOverlap, OverlapBlockList* pOBTemp, 
00086                                     OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal, OverlapResult& result) const;
00087 
00088         // Same as above while allowing mismatches
00089         bool findOverlapBlocksInexact(const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00090                                       const AlignFlags& af, const int minOverlap, OverlapBlockList* pOBList, 
00091                                       OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal, OverlapResult& result) const;
00092 
00093         //
00094         inline bool extendSeedExactRight(SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT) const;
00095         inline bool extendSeedExactLeft(SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT) const;
00096 
00097         inline void branchSeedRight(const SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, SearchSeedQueue* pQueue) const;
00098         inline void branchSeedLeft(const SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, SearchSeedQueue* pQueue) const;
00099 
00100         //
00101         inline void extendSeedInexactRight(SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00102                                            SearchSeedVector* pOutVector) const;
00103 
00104         //
00105         inline void extendSeedInexactLeft(SearchSeed& seed, const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT,
00106                                           SearchSeedVector* pOutVector) const;
00107 
00108 
00109         //
00110         inline void calculateSeedParameters(const std::string& w, const int minOverlap, int& seed_length, int& seed_stride) const;
00111         
00112         //
00113         inline int createSearchSeeds(const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, 
00114                                      const BWT* pRevBWT, int seed_length, int seed_stride, 
00115                                      SearchSeedVector* pOutVector) const;
00116 
00117         //
00118         inline void extendSeedsExactRightQueue(const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00119                                                  ExtendDirection dir, const SearchSeedVector* pInVector, 
00120                                                  SearchSeedQueue* pOutQueue) const;
00121 
00122         //
00123         inline void extendSeedsExactRight(const std::string& w, const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00124                                                  ExtendDirection dir, const SearchSeedVector* pInVector, 
00125                                                  SearchSeedVector* pOutVector) const;
00126         
00127         // Calculate the terminal extension for the contained blocks to make the intervals consistent
00128         void terminateContainedBlocks(OverlapBlockList& containedBlocks) const;
00129 
00130         //                    
00131         // Irreducible-only processing algorithms
00132         //
00133         // Reduce the block list pOBList by removing blocks that correspond to transitive edges
00134         void computeIrreducibleBlocks(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00135                                       OverlapBlockList* pOBList, OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal) const;
00136         
00137         // these recursive functions do the actual work of computing the irreducible blocks
00138         void _processIrreducibleBlocksExact(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00139                                             OverlapBlockList& obList, OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal) const;
00140 
00141 
00142         void _processIrreducibleBlocksExactIterative(const BWT* pBWT, 
00143                                                      const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00144                                                      OverlapBlockList& inList, 
00145                                                      OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal) const;
00146         //
00147         void _processIrreducibleBlocksInexact(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00148                                               OverlapBlockList& obList, OverlapBlockList* pOBFinal) const;
00149 
00150         // Update the overlap block list with a righthand extension to b, removing ranges that become invalid
00151         void updateOverlapBlockRangesRight(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00152                                            OverlapBlockList& obList, char b) const;
00153          
00154         //                                  
00155         void extendActiveBlocksRight(const BWT* pBWT, const BWT* pRevBWT, 
00156                                      OverlapBlockList& activeList, 
00157                                      OverlapBlockList& terminalList,
00158                                      OverlapBlockList& containedList) const;
00159 
00160         double calculateBlockErrorRate(const OverlapBlock& terminalBlock, const OverlapBlock& otherBlock) const;
00161         bool isBlockSubstring(OverlapBlock& terminalBlock, const OverlapBlockList& blockList, double maxER) const;
00162 
00163         // Data
00164         const BWT* m_pBWT;
00165         const BWT* m_pRevBWT;
00166         double m_errorRate;
00167         int m_seedLength;
00168         int m_seedStride;
00169         bool m_bIrreducible;
00170         bool m_exactModeOverlap;
00171         bool m_exactModeIrreducible;
00172         
00173         // Optional parameter to limit the amount of branching that is performed
00174         int m_maxSeeds; 
00175 };
